Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1967...
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Boston (UBA) in 1967...
Had first career hit on 7/7/1969, off Scott Balogh (CI)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/3/1969, off Deacon Burns (WT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Penn on 8/18/1974...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Catcher in 1975...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Ashburn on 5/9/1979...
Hit 3 homeruns against Pontiac, driving in 8 runs on 8/5/1979...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/9/1980 to a 2-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Capital City on 4/9/1980...
Signed as a free agent by Plum Grove on 2/3/1982 to a 1-year deal worth $621,000 per year...
